resources.string: Sorry! Your device doesn\'t support speech input

Welcome to OmniCalc! 
Select a mode or hit the speaker button and say a mode to begin. 
 
Version 1.0 supports standard calculator functions and a single-variable equation solver. 
 
More calculus functions and a graphing interface are planned for future updates.

Enter equation by voice or typing. 
 
Syntax Help: 
 
Simple Equation-"3x + 4 = 10" 
 
Polynomial-"5y^3 - 4y + 11 = 0" 
 
Trig-"cos(2x) = x^2" (Must use 'x') 
(Solved on the interval 0 to 2 Pi)

Enter problem by voice or typing. 
 
Syntax Help: 
Simple Operations-"12*(8-5)+6" 
Powers-"3^4 - 9^2" 
Logs-"log(2,32)" (base 2) 
Trigonometry-"cos(0)"
